繞.definition: to wind; to coil (thread); to rotate around; to spiral; to move around; to go round (an obstacle); to by-pass; to make a detour; to confuse; to perplex

繞一圈.definition: to go around one time; to do a circuit

繞來繞去.definition: meandering and circuitous (idiom); to go around in circles and never get anywhere

繞嘴.definition: hard to get one's mouth around; a tongue-twister

繞圈子.definition: to go around in circles; to make a detour; (fig.) to beat about the bush

繞彎.definition: to go for a walk around; fig. to speak in a roundabout way

繞彎兒.definition: to go for a walk around; (fig.) to speak in a roundabout way

繞彎子.definition: lit. to go on a long detour; fig. to speak vaguely around the topic without getting to the point; to beat about the bush

繞彎子兒.definition: lit. to go on a long detour; fig. to speak vaguely around the topic without getting to the point; to beat about the bush

繞梁三日.definition: reverberates around the rafters for three days (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)

繞繞.definition: twisting and turning; involved and tricky

繞脖子.definition: tricky; involved; to beat about the bush

繞膝.definition: (children) run around parent's knees; fig. to stay to look after one's elderly parents

繞膝承歡.definition: to live with one's parents, thus bringing them happiness (idiom)

繞行.definition: to take a circular (or circuitous) route; to do a circuit; (of a planet) to orbit; (of a sailor) to circumnavigate; to take a detour; to bypass

繞路.definition: to make a detour; to take the long route

繞過.definition: to detour; to bypass; to circumvent; to avoid; to wind around (of a road etc)

繞道.definition: to go by a roundabout route; to take a detour; (medicine or civil engineering) bypass

繞遠兒.definition: to go the long way round; to take a circuitous route; (of a route) circuitous

繞騰.definition: to run a long way around; fig. to speak vaguely around the topic without getting to the point; to beat about the bush
